Articles: {"abstract": "The deal between the two crosstown Atlanta rivals will make Southern the second-largest United States utility, with about nine million customers.", "web_url": "https://www.nytimes.com/2015/08/25/business/dealbook/southern-company-to-pay-12-billion-for-agl-resources.html", "snippet": "The deal between the two crosstown Atlanta rivals will make Southern the second-largest United States utility, with about nine million customers.", "lead_paragraph": "Southern Company\u2019s acquisition of AGL Resources could yet find its true north.
